item.title: Katzenpost threat model document
item.description: Here we present a draft of the Katzenpost mixnet threat model document. We regard the threat model document as a living document which is frequently edited and in need of ongoing maintenance as we continue to develop newer mixnet protocols. Currently it is being organized by mixnet attack category and we have arranged attacks in a table with corresponding attacker capabilities.
